alert.note: Alert for Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:26PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tishomingo County through 300 PM CDT... At 226 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midway, or near Iuka, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Iuka, Midway, Oldham, Mingo, Blythe Crossing, Petertown and Carter Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
